add_libc_testsuite(libc_unittest_tests)

add_libc_unittest(
  testfilter_test
  SUITE
    libc_unittest_tests
  SRCS
    testfilter_test.cpp
  DEPENDS
    # TODO(michaelrj): Remove this dependancy. It's only here because all unit 
    # tests must have at least one dependancy.
    libc.src.__support.CPP.bit 
)
